frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and color variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider setup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage for the project.
